Articles.Content: I have a good plane and missiles with missile rails, but when i go to fight with ai or by myself, i have the trigger armed, i'm locked on, and everything else. I go to click and i have tried holding as well, but it just does not fire.

Do you have the particular missile you want to fire selected in the bdarmory in-flight GUI? (even if there''s only one type of weapon onboard) If you do and you're talking about the mouse not firing, I think it's only set to fire guns by default. Every now and again by spamming the mouse or clicking a menu with a missile armed/locked/selected will cause it to fire. I just set an action group to fire missile and that seems to work reliably.
Yes I fixed it by reinstalling BDA and dependencies, but thanks for the help!
